creditline: Gift of James F. and Louise H. Bell in memory of James S. and Sallie M. Bell
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: vase of beaker form with flaring mouth; white ground; design in brilliant underglaze blue of conventionalized palm border which springs, neck and base, from slightly bulbous belt, the latter ornamented with dragon heads and the 'wicker diaper' border
title: Ku-shaped Vase
